pkgmetadata.longdescription: Item Response Theory and Computer-Based Testing in R // A suite of practical psychometric analysis and research tools of item response theory, including the 3-parameter-logistic model and the generalized partial credit model as well as functions to perform: (1) parameter estimation, (2) automated test assembly, (3) simulation of computerized adaptive testing (CAT), and (4) assembly and simulation of multistage testing. More documentation at https://github.com/xluo11/xxIRT.
